name: The Magnet Trials
detailed_description:
After successfully developing a working magnet gun prototype, Maxwell Industrial Research's space lab is attacked! Use the magnet gun to break through obstacles and escape back to earth with the help of your trusty AI companion, Armitage.

The magnet gun can be used to attract or repel magnetic objects. The player uses this to fight enemies, solve puzzles, and cross platforms.

Features:

  • 5 different environments
  • Physics-based puzzles

  • Intense platforming

  • Physics-based fights

  • Zero-Gravity
